metadata.title: Finwise
metadata.description: Smart, Secure, Simple Financial Management. From effortless budgeting to real-time investment insights, Finwise puts you in control of your money like never before

hero.heading: Smart, Secure, Simple Financial Management
hero.subheading: From effortless budgeting to real-time investment insights, Finwise puts you in control of your money like never before

features.title: Smart Budgeting
features.description: Take the guesswork out of managing your money. Our AI-powered budgeting tool adapts to your lifestyle and helps you stay on track.

subfeatures.title: Intelligent Categorization
subfeatures.description: Automatically sorts your transactions for crystal-clear insights.

subfeatures.title: Customizable Goals
subfeatures.description: Set and track financial objectives that matter to you.

subfeatures.title: Predictive Analysis
subfeatures.description: Get ahead of your finances with spending forecasts and alerts.

features.title: Seamless Investing
features.description: Start building wealth today, no financial degree required. Finwise makes investing accessible and straightforward.

subfeatures.title: Micro-Investing
subfeatures.description: Begin with as little as $1 and watch your money grow.

subfeatures.title: Expert Portfolios
subfeatures.description: Choose from investment strategies tailored to your risk tolerance.

subfeatures.title: Real-Time Performance
subfeatures.description: Track your investments with easy-to-understand metrics and visuals.

features.title: Bank-Grade Security
features.description: Your financial data deserves the best protection. Rest easy knowing Finwise employs cutting-edge security measures.

subfeatures.title: Military-Grade Encryption
subfeatures.description: Your information is safeguarded with the highest level of encryption.

subfeatures.title: Biometric Authentication
subfeatures.description: Access your account securely with fingerprint or facial recognition.

subfeatures.title: Real-Time Fraud Detection
subfeatures.description: Our system constantly monitors for suspicious activity to keep your money safe.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Hear from those who have partnered with us.

testimonials.quote: Finwise has transformed the way I manage my finances. The AI-powered budgeting is a game-changer!
testimonials.author: Sarah Johnson

testimonials.quote: The investment tracking feature is amazing. I've never felt more in control of my financial future.
testimonials.author: Michael Chen

testimonials.quote: The security features are top-notch. I trust Finwise with my most sensitive financial information.
testimonials.author: Emily Wilson

stats.label: Transactions
stats.description: We've processed over 20 million transactions securely

stats.label: Financial Institutions
stats.description: seamlessly integrated, so you can manage all accounts

cta.title: Join Over 2000+ Users To Transform Your Finances
cta.description: Your journey to financial freedom starts here. Download Finwise today and take the first step towards a brighter financial future!

questions.question: Is Finwise secure?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We use military-grade encryption and 24/7 monitoring to protect your financial data. Your security is our top priority.

questions.question: How does the budgeting work?
questions.answer: Our AI-powered budgeting tool adapts to your lifestyle and helps you set realistic goals. It automatically categorizes your transactions and provides insights to help you save.

questions.question: Can I cancel anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings. There's no lock-in period.

questions.question: What devices does Finwise support?
questions.answer: Finwise is available on iOS and Android devices. You can also access your account through our web interface.

questions.question: How do I get support?
questions.answer: You can reach our support team through our help center, live chat, or email. We're here to help 24/7.
